content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I would appreciate if you could answer the following questions relating to your electricity and Gas Contracts to assist in my research:
- Electricity Contracts
Please can you confirm the following information regarding the electricity contracts:
1.	Who is your Electricity Supplier?
2.	Do you purchase your electricity through a framework provider or third party broker?
3.	Please confirm who the framework provider or broker is?
4.	What is the contract end date of your electricity contract?
5.	What is the estimated annual spend of the electricity contract?
6.	Approximately how many non-half-hourly electricity supplies do you have in your portfolio?
7.	Approximately, what is the annual consumption of non-half-hourly electricity supplies in kWHs?
8.	Approximately how many half-hourly electricity supplies do you have in your portfolio?
9.	Approximately, what is the annual consumption of HH electricity supplies in kWHs?
10.	Approximately how many unmetered electricity supplies do you have in your portfolio?
11.	Approximately, what is the annual consumption of unmetered electricity supplies in kWHs?
- Gas Contracts
Please can you confirm the following information regarding the gas contracts:
12.	Who is your Gas Supplier?
13.	Do you purchase your gas through a framework provider or third party broker?
14.	Please confirm who the framework provider or broker is?
15.	What is the contract end date of your gas contract?
16.	What is the estimated annual spend of the gas contract?
17.	Approximately how many gas electricity supplies do you have in your portfolio?
18.	Approximately, what is the annual consumption of gas supplies in kWHs?
- Energy Management Systems or Energy Bureau Provider
Please can you confirm the following information regarding your energy management system or energy bureau provider?
19.	Do you utilise an energy management or energy bureau software?
20.	Is this service managed in house or through an external provider?
21.	If an external provider, please confirm who the supplier is?
22.	If an external provider, what is the contract end date of your agreement with them?
Many thanks,
Yours faithfully,
Rebecca Brown.

Dear Rebecca Brown,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Gas and Electricity
Supply which we received on 01/05/2024.
As your request is a request for information relating to the environment,
this has been logged as a request under the Environmental Information
Regulations 2004 (EIR) and will be dealt with under the Regulations. The
reference number for your request can be found above.
The Environmental Information Regulations 2004 state that we must respond
to you within 20 working days, by 31/05/2024. Please do not hesitate to
contact us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
This Email, and any attachments, may contain non-public information and is
intended solely for the individual(s) to whom it is addressed. It may
contain sensitive or protectively marked material and should be handled
accordingly. If this Email has been misdirected, please notify the author
immediately. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose,
distribute, copy, print or rely on any of the information contained in it
or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments
to this Email may nevertheless contain viruses which our anti-virus
software has failed to identify. You should therefore carry out your own
anti-virus checks before opening any documents. Sheffield City Council
will not accept any liability for damage caused by computer viruses
emanating from any attachment or other document supplied with this e-mail
References
Visible links
1. mailto:[Sheffield City Council request email]

Dear Rebecca Brown,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Gas and Electricity
Supply which we received on 01/05/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
- Electricity Contracts
Please can you confirm the following information regarding the electricity
contracts:
1.      Who is your Electricity Supplier? EDF Energy
2.      Do you purchase your electricity through a framework provider or
third-party broker? Framework Provider
3.      Please confirm who the framework provider or broker is? Crown
Commercial Service
4.      What is the contract end date of your electricity contract? It is
an evergreen contract with the option to terminate September of each year
with 30 months’ notice.
5.      What is the estimated annual spend of the electricity contract?
2023/24 - £20,100,000 (includes HH, NHH, UMS)
6.      Approximately how many non-half-hourly electricity supplies do you
have in your portfolio? 1,020
7.      Approximately, what is the annual consumption of non-half-hourly
electricity supplies in kWHs? 13,500,000
8.      Approximately how many half-hourly electricity supplies do you
have in your portfolio? 112
9.      Approximately, what is the annual consumption of HH electricity
supplies in kWHs? 26,100,000
10.     Approximately how many unmetered electricity supplies do you have
in your portfolio? 2
11.     Approximately, what is the annual consumption of unmetered
electricity supplies in kWHs? 12,100,000
- Gas Contracts
Please can you confirm the following information regarding the gas
contracts:
12.     Who is your Gas Supplier? TotalEnergies Gas & Power Limited
13.     Do you purchase your gas through a framework provider or
third-party broker? Framework Provider
14.     Please confirm who the framework provider or broker is? Crown
Commercial Service
15.     What is the contract end date of your gas contract? It is an
evergreen contract with the option to terminate September of each year
with 30 months’ notice.
16.     What is the estimated annual spend of the gas contract? 2023/24 -
£8,500,000
17.     Approximately how many gas electricity supplies do you have in
your portfolio? 552
18.     Approximately, what is the annual consumption of gas supplies in
kWHs? 123,000,000
- Energy Management Systems or Energy Bureau Provider
Please can you confirm the following information regarding your energy
management system or energy bureau provider?
19.     Do you utilise an energy management or energy bureau software? Yes
20.     Is this service managed in house or through an external provider?
In house
21.     If an external provider, please confirm who the supplier is? TEAM
(Energy Auditing Agency Ltd)
22.     If an external provider, what is the contract end date of your
agreement with them? 12 month rolling contract
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [3][Sheffield City Council request email]
